name: Maglatch
description:
Submission for Scorespace Jam #18.

Pseudo bullet-hell game where you control your player using a beam,
jumping towards other wall and destroying enemy on the path.

press A/D to move, hold LMB to charge up your beam.
Release LMB after the beam hits the wall to jump towards the beam's hit position.

any enemy within the beam's area upon performing a jump will be a score.

avoid enemy's bullet, chain the combo as long as you can, aim for a all-time high score!
